sendMail

void sendMail(java.lang.String toUserIds,
              java.lang.String ccUserIds,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String content,

              throws java.lang.Throwable

toUserIds - -- to users id
ccUserIds - -- cc users id
title - -- email title
remark - -- email content
attachments - -- email file

sendMail

toUserIds - -- to users id

objectType - -- object type, such as : 'TSK', 'BUG'..., 'DOC'...
objectId - -- object id
title - -- email title
remark - -- email remark
